name: Weatherization Assistance Program
description: Free energy efficiency upgrades to cut bills for low-income homeowners and renters
fullDescription: California's Weatherization Assistance Program provides free energy efficiency upgrades to help low-income households reduce energy costs and improve home comfort and safety.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free home energy audit
- Insulation (attic, wall, floor)
- Air sealing and weatherstripping
- Heating system repairs or replacement
- Water heater repairs or replacement
- Minor home repairs for energy efficiency
- All services at no cost
howToGetIt:
1. Find your local weatherization provider
2. Check income eligibility (typically 200% federal poverty level)
3. Submit application with income documentation
4. Technician conducts home energy audit
5. Eligible improvements installed at no cost
6. Both homeowners and renters can apply
keywords: weatherization, free, insulation, air sealing, heating, water heater, low-income, energy efficiency, CSD
